need_tools.description: Whether external tools are needed to complete the task. IMPORTANT: Set to TRUE if the objective contains: (1) Local file paths (images, documents, etc.) - tools CAN read them; (2) Real-time information queries (latest news, current events, recent updates); (3) External resource access (web search, API calls, database queries); (4) Content generation (image creation, file operations); (5) Interactive operations (sending messages, executing commands). Set to FALSE only for simple conversations, general knowledge questions (not time-sensitive), or basic explanations.

summary.description: Brief 1-2 sentence summary of the user's request and key information. Identify the main intent and any critical details (file paths, search queries, specific requirements).

tool_names.description: Selected tool names (aiName) that should be invoked to complete the task. IMPORTANT: Only choose from the provided tool catalog. Do NOT generate or guess tool parameters in Judge. If need_tools=false, output an empty array []. NOTE: At runtime, this schema will be injected with an enum whitelist derived from the current tool catalog, so you can only pick allowed MCP tools.
